description: This file defines a React functional component named EmptyState, used to display a message with optional icon, title, description, and action when a list or view is empty. It includes accessibility features and styling for an 'Ocean Professional' theme.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title = 'Nothing here yet', description = 'Create a new item to get started.', icon = '🌊', action = null, role = 'status', 'aria-live': ariaLive = 'polite', })
methods.description: React functional component that renders an accessible empty state message with customizable icon, title, description, and action.

ctags.name: EmptyState
ctags.signature: ({ title = 'Nothing here yet', description = 'Create a new item to get started.', icon = '🌊', action = null, role = 'status', 'aria-live': ariaLive = 'polite', })
